name: ARCADE GIRL
description:
"This is a strange game ! At the beginning nothing work ! So try to make your best to collect the 4 stars !"

(there are hidden fonctionnality in the menu, search that !)

WASD to move, use ENTER and SPACE to shoot and jump (escape for menu), you can also play with a GAMEPAD.

Made in 48 hours for the ludum dare 45 (COMPO),  it's a prototype of meta arcade game.

Concept, Graphics, programming, and music composition by me.

GAME ENGINE :

GAME MAKER STUDIO2.

SOFTWARE:

AUDACITY, OSCILAB, PAINT.NET.

FONTS :

LOADED Andrew Wilson.
MINECRAFTORY Jayvee Enaguas.
PIXEL DIGIVOLVE par Pixel Sagas.
